description:
#TheNewNormal isn't new ðŸ™„
People still can't fathom that this entire crisis is a preplanned, psychological operation that is using textbook social conditioning techniques alongside good old fashioned fear-mongering to get the human population to willingly reliquish their rights and consequently, attack and condemn those who are not compliant in reliquishing their rights.
.
We have seen a rapid total global government takeover happen within weeks, something that has not occured in history thus far and yet most people, who have been ""blissfully ignorant"" of the real power structures on this planet that operate beyond national politics, are still completely clueless as to what is going on as they cowardly obey any and all mandates given to them by our, now obviously, tyrannical governments.
.
The vast majority does not realize that we as a human race have entered into the vanguard of long forewarned #NewWorldOrder which has been the goal of the ruling elites for centuries; #Totalitarian control of the entire human population via #Technocracy #HyperSurveillance #MedicalTyranny #MartialLaw and #TotalControl through #FearMongering & #Oppresive #Regimes reducing humanity to nothing but #Subserveant #Slaves who're at the mercy of their #Pyscopathic #Rulers and their #Tyrannical #Rules & #Laws
.
If people do not #WakeUp and #StandUp against this #oppression now, the human race is on a FAST TRACK TO A #DYSTOPIC #LIVINGNIGHTMARE that they very well may never be able to come back from; which is the reason that those of us whose soul purpose for being on social media is to spread the #Awakening and ignite the #Revolution are not letting up with spreading the truth because there is VERY LITTLE TIME LEFT BEFORE IT IS QUITE LITERALLY A GAME OVER FOR THE HUMAN RACE'S SHOT AT A BRIGHT FUTURE!!
.
If this scares you, it very well should!! It should light the fire under your ass that what we are dealing with right now is one of the most pivotal points in human history and if you do not #StandUpForYourRights NOW, THERE WILL BE NO FUTURE WORTH LIVING FOR, the world will be reduced to a #HungerGames society where love will be nearly nonexistent, truly #HellOnEarth so please #WakeTfUp
